item.title: Adding text to an image using OpenCV and Python
item.description: In a series of upcoming blog posts, I will be using OpenCV to manipulate images. In this post, I will be adding text to an image (below), I took of a Dervish monastery at the beautiful village of Blagaj in Bosnia. Resized Original Resized Original w/ text Lets get started.
